code: import{LocalStorageKeyEnum}from'../_enums/localStorageKeyEnum';import React from'react';var useLocalStorage=function useLocalStorage(){var getItem=React.useCallback(function(key){var item=window.localStorage.getItem(LocalStorageKeyEnum[key]);return item?JSON.parse(item):{};},[]);var setItem=React.useCallback(function(key,value){window.localStorage.setItem(LocalStorageKeyEnum[key],value);},[]);var result={getItem:getItem,setItem:setItem};return result;};export default useLocalStorage;
